translations: 小烧锅；<古>妓女，卖淫者（cocotte 的复数）

sentences.sentence: In our search for the “new” Paris, we went to lunch at Les Cocottes, a fantastic casual-chic restaurant, and were seated next to two very Parisian ladies.
sentences.translation: 调查是关于“新”巴黎，我们去了Les Cocottes吃午餐，那是一家极好的、气氛随意却又别致高雅的餐厅，一旁邻座的是两位典型的巴黎女郎。
